headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Edge Lower As Jobs And Inflation Collide
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Friday, Jan, 9 2026 US stock futures are slightly softer this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts down about 0.1%, as investors focus on two big forces pulling in different directions. First, the December jobs report is expected to show nonfarm payrolls at +60,000 and unemployment at 4.5%, which points to a job market that is cooling and could weigh on household spending. Second, fresh data from China shows consumer inflation near a 3 year high...
